name: Ghost hunt (thornt)
description:
A "game" for the game jam. You point your light at the ghost to reveal them and shoot to destroy them.

Controls:
Right click to move.

S to stop moving.

Left click enemy and then press Q to fire.

W to speed up from one point to another.

E to make the light bigger.

Alt + f4 to exit.

Sources:

Some movement - https://docs.unity3d.com/ScriptReference/Vector2.MoveTowards.html

Homing projectile code - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0v_H3oOR0aU

Sounds - https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone
